definition: bronze medal/bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc/CL:枚[mei2]
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: It won two silver and one bronze medals in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 在雅典该国获得了两枚银牌和一枚铜牌。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong team also won a bronze medal in the water ski team event.
sentences.chinese: 香港队在滑水队际赛中同时亦夺得一面铜牌。

sentences.english: And China's Wang Liqin defeated Sweden's Jorgen Persson for bronze.
sentences.chinese: 而中国的王励勤击败瑞典的佩尔森获得铜牌。

sentences.english: When were gold, silver and bronze medals awarded?
Gold, silver and bronze medals weren't given out until the third modern Olympics, in 1904.
sentences.chinese: 1904年第三届现代奥运会上才开始颁发金银铜牌。

sentences.english: Duncan went on to win the silver medal and Leman earned the bronze.
sentences.chinese: 邓肯继续赢得银牌，莱曼获得了铜牌。

sentences.english: Zhang Yining and Guo Yan, both of China, picked bronze medals.
sentences.chinese: 张怡宁和郭燕获得了此次比赛的铜牌。

sentences.english: Host Canada took the silver and the US picked up the bronze.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大队和美国队分获银牌和铜牌。

sentences.english: Payne was delighted to have added Olympic silver to his world bronze.
sentences.chinese: 佩恩对世锦赛铜牌加奥运银牌的成绩感到非常高兴。

sentences.english: Alessandra Sensini from Italy took the silver medal and Bryony Shaw from Britain claimed the bronze medal.
sentences.chinese: 意大利森西尼获得了银牌，英国的肖获得了铜牌。

sentences.english: They were also made in bronze, as well as in ordinary grey-black pottery.
sentences.chinese: 他们也取得了铜牌，以及在普通灰黑色陶器。

sentences.english: Pedro retired after winning his second Olympic bronze medal in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 佩德乐在雅典获得第二面奥运铜牌后退休。

sentences.english: The rest of the field was left to jockey for the silver and bronze medal positions.
sentences.chinese: 其余的外地左骑师的银牌和铜牌的立场。

sentences.english: It's also important to win silver and bronze medals.
sentences.chinese: 赢得银牌和铜牌也非常重要。

sentences.english: It won four gold medals, in the men's and the women's 5, 000- and 10, 000-meters, and bronze in the men's marathon on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天又获得了男子马拉松铜牌。

sentences.english: He won three golds and a bronze.
sentences.chinese: 他获得三枚金牌和一枚铜牌。

definition: medal table/tally of trophies/list of prizewinners
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
